english.segment1: I've grown so tired of running circles around myself in search of something new. Only when I stood still I could see you were there. and you were waiting for me to fall in love with you
english.segment2: Now I swear just on principle. With you near I feel like I'm invincible
english.segment3: All that I've wanted is standing in front of me. All that I'll need that's for sure. You came to my bed when I was sick and you brought your cure
english.segment4: Once I was frail. Now I have been repaired in all the lovely things you do. You do them so well. Come my dear. Let me hold you and soak in the love that we've made 'cause it's right on queue
english.segment5: I rest in our citadel. At our best our love is so incredible
english.segment6: All that I've wanted is standing in front of me. All that I'll need that's for sure. You came into my room when I was sick and you brought me the cure
english.segment7: I was under the weather. But now I've pulled it together. So let me do what it takes to take care of you
english.segment8: All that I've wanted is standing in front of me. All that I'll need that's for sure. You came into my room when I was sick and you made me yours
english.segment9: All you could need and expect it will come from me. No one will ever love you more. You're in my world for good and our love will always be the cure
